{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.14935v1", "title": "An elementary definition of opetopic sets", "summary": "We propose elementary definitions of opetopes and opetopic sets. We directly
define opetopic sets by a simple structure and several axioms. Opetopes are
then opetopic sets satisfying one more axiom. We show that our definition is
equivalent to the polynomial monad definition given by Kock, Joyal, Batanin,
and Mascari. We also show that our category of opetopes is equivalent to the
one given by Ho Thanh.", "main_category": "math.CT", "categories": "math.CT", "published": "2025-04-21T07:56:23Z"}
